title: Jacob deGrom Leads Metsâ€™ Off-Season Shopping List
description: Despite his injury issues, Jacob deGrom is expected to garner a contract in excess of $100 million. He is one of several Mets players who are about to test free agency.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:credit: Michelle Farsi for The New York Times
media:description: Jacob deGrom has been limited to 26 starts over the last two seasons because of injuries, but he has pitched well with a 1.90 E.R.A. in that span.
